name: Recuse Hostage: Shooting Snipe
description:
Recuse Hostage: Shooting Sniper MS is a brand new sniping game where all you have to do is hunt the targets that appear in the traffic. Here are some bad guys in their vehicles. In missions, you have to perform various tasks like shooting the vehicles or assassinating the bad guys.
Features
- Amazing 3D environment
- Thrilling game for sniper shooting game lovers
- Addictive Gameplay
- Aim Target, Shoot it and Takeout Headshots.
- Counter Terrorist Shoot - Best Shooting Game
- Elite Sniper - Secret Sniper Counter Terroi
